name: ralph-ollama-standalone
description: Ralph Ollama integration - Use local LLM with Ollama for development workflows

scripts.install:deps: bash -c 'if [ ! -d "venv" ]; then echo "‚ùå Virtual environment not found. Run: npm run install"; exit 1; fi && source venv/bin/activate && pip install --upgrade pip && pip install -r requirements.txt'
scripts.install:playwright: bash -c 'if [ ! -d "venv" ]; then echo "‚ùå Virtual environment not found. Run: npm run install"; exit 1; fi && source venv/bin/activate && if ! python3 -c "import playwright" 2>/dev/null; then echo "‚ùå Playwright package not installed. Run: npm run install:deps"; exit 1; fi && echo "üì¶ Installing Playwright browsers..." && playwright install chromium && echo "‚úÖ Playwright browsers installed"'
scripts.install:all: npm run install && npm run install:playwright
scripts.postinstall: echo '‚úÖ Run npm run install to set up the virtual environment and install dependencies'
